publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-170# Mr Nick Johnston: Telecommunications—That the Parliament notes the recent report of the House of Commons Science and Technology Committee into mobile phones & telecommunications, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce legislation quickly to bring mobile telephone masts within the control of local planning authorities.

S1M-170# Mr Nick Johnston: Telecommunications-That the Parliament notes the recent report of the House of Commons Science and Technology Committee into mobile phones & telecommunications, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce legislation quickly to bring mobile telephone masts within the control of local planning authorities.
